thread.title: Slow start, anemic power play dooms Canucks in 4-3 loss to Blues

author: Joshua Clipperton
title: Slow start, anemic power play dooms Canucks in 4-3 loss to Blues
text: Hockey St. Louis Blues' Paul Stastny, from left to right, Alexander Steen, Joel Edmundson and Robert Bortuzzo celebrate Steen's goal as Vancouver Canucks' goalie Ryan Miller, top right, looks away during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Vancouver, B.C., on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. (DARRYL DYCK/THE CANADIAN PRESS) St. Louis Blues' Paul Stastny, from left to right, Alexander Steen, Joel Edmundson and Robert Bortuzzo celebrate Steen's goal as Vancouver Canucks' goalie Ryan Miller, top right, looks away during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Vancouver, B.C., on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015.(DARRYL DYCK/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Slow start, anemic power play dooms Canucks in 4-3 loss to Blues Add to ...
